welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Denville! Known for its charming small-town atmosphere and picturesque lake, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport is exclusively for private flights and offers VIP services.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Teterboro Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private aviation and offers luxury amenities for private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal at Linden Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
